name: Yasuo
title: the Unforgiven
lore: An Ionian of deep resolve, Yasuo is an agile swordsman who wields the air itself against his enemies. As a proud young man, he was falsely accused of murdering his master—unable to prove his innocence, he was forced to slay his own brother in self defense. Even after his master's true killer was revealed, Yasuo still could not forgive himself for all he had done, and now wanders his homeland with only the wind to guide his blade.
blurb: An Ionian of deep resolve, Yasuo is an agile swordsman who wields the air itself against his enemies. As a proud young man, he was falsely accused of murdering his master—unable to prove his innocence, he was forced to slay his own brother in self...
allytips: Dash through a minion to have Sweeping Blade available to chase your opponent should they flee; Dash directly to your opponent to preserve a minion as your escape route.
At level 18, Yasuo's Steel Tempest reaches its Attack Speed cap with 55% Attack Speed from items.
Last Breath can be cast on any target that is knocked Airborne, even by one of your allies.
enemytips: Steel Tempest is very narrow. Dodge laterally if possible.
When Yasuo lands two Steel Tempests in a row, his next will fire a tornado. Watch and listen for the associated sound to prepare to dodge.
Yasuo is at his weakest just after he has launched a whirlwind. Engage at that point.
Yasuo's shield from Resolve lasts only 2 seconds. Dealing damage to him will trigger it. Wait it out, then engage.

riot_spells.name: Steel Tempest
riot_spells.description:
Thrusts forward, damaging all enemies in a line.

On hit, grants a stack of Gathering Storm for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, Steel Tempest fires a whirlwind that knocks Airborne.

Steel Tempest is treated as a basic attack and scales with all the same things.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Thrusts forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

On hit, grants a stack of Gathering Storm for 6 seconds. At 2 stacks, Steel Tempest fires a whirlwind that knocks Airborne.

Steel Tempest is treated as a basic attack: It can critically strike, applies on-hit effects, is interruptible by crowd control and its cooldown and cast time are reduced by Attack Speed.

If cast while dashing, Steel Tempest will strike as a circle.

riot_spells.name: Wind Wall
riot_spells.description: Creates a moving wall that blocks all enemy projectiles for 4 seconds.
riot_spells.tooltip: Creates a moving wall that blocks all enemy projectiles for 4 seconds.

riot_spells.name: Sweeping Blade
riot_spells.description:
Dashes through target enemy, dealing magic damage. Each cast increases your next dash's base Damage, up to a max amount.

Cannot be re-cast on the same enemy for a few seconds.

If Steel Tempest is cast while dashing, it will strike as a circle.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Dashes through target enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage. Each cast increases your next dash's base Damage by {{ e5 }}%, up to +50%.

Cannot be re-cast on the same enemy for {{ e2 }} seconds.

If Steel Tempest is cast while dashing, it will strike as a circle.

riot_spells.name: Last Breath
riot_spells.description:
Blinks to an Airborne enemy champion, dealing physical damage and holding all Airborne enemies in the area in the air. Grants maximum Flow but resets all stacks of Gathering Storm.

For a moderate time afterwards, Yasuo's critical strikes gain significant Bonus Armor Penetration.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Blinks to an Airborne enemy champion, dealing {{ damage }} physical damage and holding all Airborne enemies in the area in the air for an additional {{ rknockupduration }} second(s). Grants maximum Flow but resets all stacks of Gathering Storm.

For {{ rbuffduration }} second(s), Yasuo's critical strikes gain {{ rpercentarmorpen }}% Bonus Armor Penetration - this affects Armor from items, buffs, and runes.

riot_passive.name: Way of the Wanderer
riot_passive.description: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is doubled. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.

i1.name: Way of the Wanderer
i1.blurb: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is doubled. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.
i1.description: {{sbc|Intent:}} '''Yasuo''' doubles his {{as|{{sti|'''total''' critical strike chance}}}} from all other sources, but his {{sti|critical strike damage|critical strikes}} deal only {{as|{{critical damage|80|90}} AD}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}}.
i1.description2: {{sbc|Resolve:}} '''Yasuo''' generates {{tip|Flow}} for every {{pp|3|59 to 46|1 to 13}} units he travels by any means. At {{ft|100 stacks|{{pp|3|59*100 to 46*100|1 to 13}} units traveled}} and upon taking [[champion]] or [[monster]] damage, '''Yasuo''' consumes {{tip|Flow|all Flow}} to {{tip|shield}} himself for {{pp|18|100|105|110|115|120|130|140|150|165|180|200|225|255|290|330|380|440|510}} for up to 1 second.
i1.notes: * {{iis|Statikk Shiv}} critical strike is also affected by ''Intent'' damage reduction, dealing a total of {{as|{{pp|108;108;108;108;ceil (60+80/13*(x-1))*2*0.9|round=ceil|formula = base*2*0.9}} magic damage}}.

q1.name: Steel Tempest
q1.blurb: A skillshot basic attack. After two successful Steel Tempests, the next fires a tornado that knocks enemies Airborne.
q1.description: {{sbc|First Cast - Steel Tempest:}} After a {{as|{{pp|9|type='''bonus''' attack speed|round=3|0.4 to 0.148;2/15|key1=%|0 to 105;1000/9|formula=0.4*(1-(0.01 per 1.67% '''bonus''' attack speed)). ''This is capped at 67% reduction at 111.1% '''bonus''' attack speed.''}}|attack speed}} second-delay, '''Yasuo''' thrusts his sword to deal {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in the target direction, applying [[on-hit effect]]s to the first target hit. Casting ''Steel Tempest'' while dashing with ''{{ai|Sweeping Blade}}'' will instead affect enemies around '''Yasuo''' at the end of the dash.
q1.description2: ''Steel Tempest'' can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|60|80}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
q1.description3: If ''Steel Tempest'' hits an enemy, he gains a ''Gathering Storm'' stack for 6 seconds to which he's able to cast ''Steel Wind Rising''.
q1.description4: {{sbc|Second Cast - Steel Wind Rising:}} '''Yasuo''' casts ''Steel Tempest''. If it hits an enemy, '''Yasuo''' can gain another ''Gathering Storm'' stack to which he can cast ''Gathering Storm''.
q1.description5: {{sbc|Third Cast - Gathering Storm:}} '''Yasuo''' unleashes a whirlwind that travels in the target direction, dealing the same damage and {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} all enemies hit. The whirlwind is not released when cast during ''{{ai|Sweeping Blade}}'', but '''Gathering Storm''' still gains the {{tip|airborne|knock up}}.
q1.static: {{as|{{pp|9|type='''bonus''' attack speed|4 to 1.48;4/3|key1=%|0 to 105;1000/9|formula=4*(1-(0.01 per 1.67% '''bonus''' attack speed)). ''This is capped at 67% reduction at 111.1% '''bonus''' attack speed.''}}|attack speed}}
q1.notes:
* ''Steel Tempest'' counts as single-target for the first enemy hit and [[area of effect]] for the others.
** {{ri|Ravenous Hunter}} will only heal from the damage dealt to secondary targets.
* Each parry has different interactions with this ability, whether it's the first target of ''Steel Tempest'' or the secondary one. In either case '''Yasuo''' still gets a stack of ''Gathering Storm'' and his whirlwind knockup cannot be blocked:
** {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax}}: both first target and secondary target '''do not''' deal damage.
** {{ai|Spirit's Refuge|Shen}}: first target '''does not''' deal damage, secondary target '''does''' deal damage.
** {{ai|Blinding Dart|Teemo}}: both first target and secondary target '''do''' deal damage.
* ''Steel Tempest'' will not apply [[ability effects|spell effects]] to the first target hit, but will do so to the secondary ones.
* ''Steel Tempest's'' damage is calculated individually for every enemy hit when {{tip|critical strike|critically striking}}.
* ''Steel Tempest'' is not considered a basic attack for effects like {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} and stacking {{tip|Energized|Energizing}} attacks.
* Unlike other abilities, the first two ''Steel Tempests'' will cancel and reset their cooldown if '''Yasuo''' is {{tip|stun|stunned}} during their cast time.
** The third ''Steel Tempest'' will continue its cast through the stun.
** If '''Yasuo''' however buffers ''Steel Tempest'' after {{ai|Sweeping Blade|Yasuo}}, a stun will cause ''Steel Tempest'' to cancel and go on full cooldown.

w1.name: Wind Wall
w1.blurb: Creates a moving wall that blocks enemy projectiles.
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yasuo''' creates a gust of wind that travels in the target direction over {{tt|{{fd|0.25}} seconds|Estimated}} to form a wall in front of him. The wall slowly drifts forward 50 units over {{fd|3.75}} seconds, blocking all enemy [[projectile]]s except {{tip|turret}} attacks.
w1.notes: * ''Wind Wall'' starts blocking projectiles on-cast (despite not being fully formed) and grants {{tip|sight}} over a small area.

e1.name: Sweeping Blade
e1.blurb: Dashes through a unit, dealing escalating Magic Damage with each cast.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yasuo''' {{tip|dashes}} a fixed distance toward a target enemy, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}}.
e1.description2: Each ''Sweeping Blade'' cast increases the next dash's '''base''' damage by 25% for 5 seconds, up to 50%.
e1.description3: '''Yasuo''' cannot dash to the same target more than once every few seconds.
e1.notes:
* ''Sweeping Blade's'' dash speed is affected by {{tip|slow|slows}}, and '''Yasuo''' will be {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} by any {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} crowd control.
* ''Sweeping Blade'' will generate {{tt|{{fd|7.5}}|If he dashes the maximum distance}} {{tip|Flow}} stacks per cast.
* ''Yasuo'' can use ''Sweeping Blade's'' fixed dash distance to cross walls both before and after hitting his target (provided his proximity to the wall and/or target allows it).

r1.name: Last Breath
r1.blurb: Moves to a unit and strikes them repeatedly for heavy damage. Can only be cast on Airborne targets.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yasuo''' {{tip|blinks}} to the other side of a {{tip|sight|visible}} {{tip|airborne}} enemy champion nearest to the cursor, instantly generating maximum {{tip|Flow}} while resetting ''{{ais|Steel Tempest}}'' stacks.
r1.description2: Upon arrival, he {{tip|suspension|suspends}} all nearby {{tip|airborne}} enemies around the target for 1 second, dealing {{as|physical damage}} thereafter.
r1.description3: For the next 15 seconds, '''Yasuo's''' {{tip|critical strikes}} gain {{sti|lethality|{{as|50% '''bonus''' armor penetration}}}}.
r1.description4: ''If '''Yasuo''' would be placed inside a turret's attack range upon blinking, he will instead attempt to position himself outside it (does not apply to [[Nexus Obelisk]]).''
r1.notes:
* ''Last Breath's'' area of effect when suspending enemies increases per rank.
* ''Last Breath's'' damage and bonus armor penetration do not interact with each other.
* Suspended enemies are immune to further displacements during ''Last Breath's'' animation time.
** Casting right after the triggering displacement(s) will overwrite the latter's duration (whether shorter/longer) to ''Last Breath's'' animation time (durations will not stack).
* The targets will remain suspended and the damage will be applied even if '''Yasuo''' dies during it.
* Many displacement abilities that affect enemy champions are considered {{tip|Airborne}}, and will therefore interact with ''Last Breath''.
** Self-applied displacements cannot be targeted by ''Last Breath'':
** Enemies displaced by neutral monsters (e.g. {{uis|Dragon}} initial knock-back) can be targeted.
** Enemies displaced by their allies (e.g {{cai|Crystallize|Anivia}}, {{cai|Volcanic Rupture|Ornn}}, {{cai|Pillar of Ice|Trundle}}) can be targeted.
